name: Makeover Master - Makeup ASMR
description:
Shhh! Start ASMR makeup & skincare!

Let me see the first customer! Frame glasses, acne, uneven skin tone... It seems that the amount of work is not small, it doesn't matter! Let's work together to make her beautiful!

First, take off your glasses, wash your face, remove any troublesome pimples, put on a mask to soothe your skin, then use foundation to even out your skin tone, use eyeshadow to create the most agile eyes, use lipstick to outline the perfect lip shape, and a variety of fashionable hairstyles and clothing to help dress up!

Feature:
- It's like experiencing a girl's beauty experience firsthand!
- Tons of real beauty tools to use.
- Apply the mineral mask to the girl's face.
- DIY makeup is popular and fun.
- Ready for skincare!

ASMR makeup experience! Download now and play for free!
developers: 上海传影科技有限公司
